website_summaries.verdict: The perfect biotin supplement for young children or adults who have trouble swallowing pills.
pros: Easy-to-chew gummies work great for customers who have issues swallowing pills
Free of gluten and high-fructose corn syrup
cons: Some customers don't like the blueberry taste or the consistency of the gummy

website_summaries.verdict: Biotin helps the body process fats, proteins, and carbohydrates. Biotin supplements are designed to improve hair, skin, and nail health.
pros: Offers 5,000 micrograms of biotin per serving
Several users report very positive effects on reversing hair loss
Most users really enjoy the taste of these, making them an easy supplement to remember to take

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING!!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing product!!!! After two weeks use I can already see results. New hairs are sprouting everywhere I loss hair. Will be using this product for the remainder of my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: The taste is excellent as many reviews have stated. I have found that excessive biotin intake can lead to acne, so I proactively drink a good amount of water on the days I take these vitamins to help with my skin. I had damaged hair from over processing my hair, I started taking two of these in the morning and two at night and noticed a dramatic difference. Not only did my hair grow at an incredible rate, the condition of my hair improved dramatically as well. It was much longer, but also much stronger. Just ordered these again to start taking in preparation for my wedding next year!
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: No more Acrylics Needed
customer_reviews.text: These work! Keep taking them, started noticing a big difference in both my hair and nails after a solid month of taking them daily. Will keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: nancywonderland

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of these biotin gummies. They taste great, which is a plus, but the results I'm seeing from using them are amazing. In only a month my nail and skin health has improved drastically. My nails are much smoother and stronger and my skin just seems more evenly toned and smoother as well. I haven't seen much of a change on my hair, but I feel that will be a much more long term thing to look out for. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, and work too!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my hair and nails. Tastes so good. Actually all vita-fusion gummies taste great. Would recomment this brand. It really does help with hair and nails. I can tell my hair is growing faster and is shiner and my nails are in way better shape.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: I have been using for about three months before my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for about three months before my wedding. I have acne prone skin and I noticed my skin cleared up within a couple of weeks of using this product. The difference is how fast your hair grows, all my hair grew about twice as fast as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BIOTIN!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a HUGE improvement on my skin. I waited until I used the whole container to write this review. My nails grow faster and my hair is really strong and healthy. This is highly recommended and I will be buying again! Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Jaguilarz

customer_reviews.title: My hair and nails are looking fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting married in a few months and wanted to be sure my hair and nails looked their best for that day. I kept hearing about how great biotin was but was hesitant to buy it after hearing it causes acne. I already had an issue with acne so I didn't want to aggravate it more but I decided to take that risk. I am now going to start my second bottle of this and am happy to report that I did not experience any acne from it! Also, I personally feel that my hair has grown much longer than if I was taking it and my nails are less prone to breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and tasty
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is promising. I'll be using it from now on. I purchased this bottle because my nails were weak and chipping and my hair was dry and unmanageable but and I wanted to look better for a family event. I started taking it as directed for a week and my nails became stronger and my hair more manageable. I shared the gummies with family members who came and stay with me for the event and they loved the taste. So this is not just my personal opinion rather I was collecting others feedback. This product is a keeper. Satisfactory all around it does what it supposed to do and it taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Dogar

customer_reviews.title: Buy it well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Hair is looking more healthy compared to before even my bf noticed and he never notices anything😂 . but im loving it taste 😋 def buying more.
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN CUEVAS

customer_reviews.title: Research Before Taking
customer_reviews.text: I had a severe breakout after taking this product as prescribed. After doing some research I found information about possible side affects that included a rash breakout from biotin overdose. Your experience may be different. Mine was a horrible one. I’m currently taking only one gummy and so far I’ve had no reaction to the lower dose. So far, I’ve yet to see any hair or nails improvement.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I took this for about a month and within the last 2 weeks I have started breaking out all over my torso, neck, and face with painful, itchy bumps. I ceased taking the supplement about 1-1/2 weeks ago. Am taking Benadryl to manage the breakouts. I wouldn't recommend this stuff to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: They have made a difference
customer_reviews.text: My hair was thinning and a family member suggested I try Vitafusion Extra Strength Biotin Gummies. I was skeptical but after using them for six months I have to say that they have made a difference. My hair is growing much faster and thickening back up. Only wish I'd starting taking them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: coloradogal

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these so much, I honestly wish they would make a snack out of these to eat, lol. I did notice my nails started growing twice as fast. My main reason for getting these was to grow my hair out faster. Since it has seemed to have slowed down over the years. It also become very damaged from bleaching and tape in extensions, so had to give my hair a break to repair and grow, as it was very thin. These are definitely helping, and is a common brand you can find in the store unlike some of these other off the wall brands that have 20k prefect reviews for free products and what not.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have been taking 2 a day for about a month now. I purchased these right after I took off my acrylic set and saw how terrible my nails looked. They have always been very week and brittle and they chip easily. I am starting to see growth and the mail seems to be hard. I will review more once they grow a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: Not your normal millennials

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I am black and have coarse hair, I had hopes for this product but I didn’t know it would work this well. I decided to try something new because I’ve always been taking biotin gummies but no one has ever worked so well. I started seeing results in a week and I am truly surprised. Infact I have so much hair now after using it for a WHILE that I am truly shocked. I would really recommend this product but I’ve never been a fan of blueberries but I’ll do anything to see my hair grow.
customer_reviews.author: Lelee

customer_reviews.title: I'll definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these for a month so I'm not seeing a major difference in my hair/nail growth, but no negative reactions either. I CAN say they taste good, typical gummy texture, and were fresh on arrival. I was tired of taking the big horse capsules and just wanted an easier way to get my daily biotin.
customer_reviews.author: Genedoll

customer_reviews.title: Best Gummies For Growth
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these gummies since November 17, 2019. Today is February 20, 2020 (picture attached) I have noticed a huge change in my nail growth the past 3 months taking these. I always had a bad habit of biting my nails ever since I was a little girl and could not shake it no matter what I do and now it's not even an issue anymore, I have no urge to bite. I was surprised how fast my nails are growing after just taking these for three months so far I have went through two bottles already and now starting on my third.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Vitafusion Extra Strength Biotin Gummies - 100 Count for one month and I have seen growth or thickening of my lower eyelashes and growth of my fingernails. I don't usually consume the two gummies per day serving suggestion. What I normally do is alternate with a single gummy for several days and then take two gummies sometimes. I do this because of the strength and the fact that I take a multivitamin which also contains biotin and don't want to risk severe acne breakouts which one can get from biotin. I also try to increase my water intake to mitigate any possible breakouts. It tastes great, too... ☺
customer_reviews.author: S Moss

customer_reviews.title: Grows hair if you are deficient in biotin!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, if you already have a healthy diet, biotin supplements wont do anything for you, but if your diet is poor, as mine is, this will definitely do the trick! Second, don't take too many! Big you use more than the recommended dose age, your hair and nails will grow a bit faster, however... this will also cause hair and nails to become brittle and you will start to see breakage. If you've got a deficiency though and your thinning hair is due to lack of biotin in your diet, this supplement does wonders. Bestnof all the gummies taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Results!
customer_reviews.text: These are so fantastic!! I’d been feeling like my hair had been thinning a bit along my hairline and my part (I’m almost 30), so I ordered these gummies based on the good reviews. I’ve been taking them religiously for about 3 weeks and have already seen fantastic results!! My nails don’t seem to be growing much faster than they normally do, but I feel like my hair is back to how it used to look years ago. I’m so happy!! My husband started taking them as well after seeing how well they worked for me. Very highly recommend! (I know the lighting is a bit different in my before and after pics but you get the gist!)
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: These definitely work!
customer_reviews.text: These taste good and they definitely work too. I got these when I was about 3 months post partum and I had been losing hair like crazy and my nails were thin and brittle. After taking these for about 2 to 3 weeks I noticed significantly less shedding and my nails are thick and even stronger than they were before being pregnant..
customer_reviews.author: Cortney & Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This Biotin Makes Hair and Nails, Healthier and Stronger!
customer_reviews.text: This Biotin works so well, I have to cut several inches off my hair about every 6 weeks, and my hair is normally in bad shape and doesn't grow. My nails are also healthier and grow when I take this on a regular basis. My skin is in better condition with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Zero improvement
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taking this vitamins for four weeks, every single day and I don’t see ANY IMPROVEMENT. My hair is still falling and it hasn’t improved. My skin is the same and my nails is the same. I don’t know what’s the thing about it or why is helpful. The gummies taste good though.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, helps with hair growth
customer_reviews.text: These have a great flavor. I look forward to eating 2 first every morning. Meanwhile, I frequently forget my tablet multivitamin at night since there’s nothing exciting about it! I’m just getting over my post-partum hair loss, and this really has helped my hair grow back faster. Beware though- it doesn’t just help your hair on your head!
customer_reviews.author: A. Vessels

customer_reviews.title: Seem To Work A Little
customer_reviews.text: I got these to see if they'd help my nails / hair growth. I didn't notice any immediate changes of course, so I waited a while before writing this review My nails are smoother and stronger, but they don't seem to be growing any faster. Haven't noticed any increase in hair growth rate, as of yet. Overall, the gummies are a nice flavor and they're easy to chew, almost like having some candy. I'm not positive if I would buy this brand again, but I don't feel like I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Zero Surico

customer_reviews.title: Helped Restore Hair and Nails
customer_reviews.text: I read that Biotin helps maintain healthy hair, skin, and nails. After a stressful health incident (not chemotherapy) I lost a little less than half my hair. What hair remained was lacking its usual strength, shine, and curl. I have been taking this biotin supplement for at least 9 months. Most of my hair has grown back, is much stronger, and has curl again. My nails have improved somewhat as well. I'm very pleased and grateful for these Biotin supplements.
customer_reviews.author: nowelle ross

customer_reviews.title: Hair had been thinning
customer_reviews.text: After almost 2 months of consistent intake i do see a bit of a difference in the areas where i was seeing sparseness on my sides...ANd i can't wait to take these...the flavor is yummy :)
customer_reviews.author: Janine Long

customer_reviews.title: Promotes faster hair and nails growth IMO
customer_reviews.text: A little to sugary sometimes kind of gross to eat. But see better results than just natural hair growth, nails grow a little faster and facial hair coming in faster.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Fast Growing Nails, Hair Unsure
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a few months now. I used to use for hims but figured I could save some money by buying everything individually. I am not sure if it has helped with my hair, but my nails grow in super fast with this. I take them once a day in the morning, and plan to do so for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: over the years my hair has been terribly thinning! Since starting the keto way of eating, its gotten much worse. I absolutely hate swallowing pills.. these chew-able vitamins are great! They taste amazing! I just ordered my second bottle, so ive been using for about 6 weeks or so.. i haven't noticed any hair growing in yet, but the amount i shed when drying my hair has drastically decreased. This product works!!!
customer_reviews.author: shael dehors

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY but still works.
customer_reviews.text: My dermatolist recommended biotin when my hair started coming out and was very slow to grow back. I’m nearly finished my 2nd bottle of Vitafusion Biotin. I’m absolutely a fan. They’re quite tasty. They have never made me nauseous unlike most other vitamins. But even more importantly I’m finally getting some significant hair growth. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: mswvu34

customer_reviews.title: Ditch A Pill & Pop A Gummie
customer_reviews.text: Remember your flavored kid vitamins? Now, we can get our nutrients with a fun gummy. Nice flavor and an easy chew. Why should kids have all the fun?
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product! Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am almost complete with my first bottle and I have noticed a tremendous change in my body. My hair is longer, my nails are very strong. They also grow so fast that I have to clip them constantly! My face looks smoother than I've ever been able to keep it. I take them every morning and ensure that I drink a fair amount of water. Keep with taking them daily and you'll notice a great change in your appearance!
customer_reviews.author: Whatuptee

customer_reviews.title: Made my nails stronger, didn’t do much for hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help my hair loss and brittle nails. It definitely helps with brittle nails! My nails are much stronger than before. However, this hasn’t done much for my hair loss or growth. It’s about the same and I’ve been using this for almost a year now! It tastes great and easy to swallow. I’m going to keep taking it since it’s helping my nails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Nails!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this product for several months and both of us have noticed a great improvement in the strength and health of our finger nails. I think our hair is thicker too and we are both in our 60's. I was told to cut out calcium supplementation due to health issues, and my doctor suggested biotin when I complained about my nails. I absolutely love the flavor of these little gems and they work too!
customer_reviews.author: Selah

customer_reviews.title: Experienced slight and unusual headaches.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking them for a month now, and I feel/see no effect. Approximately after 3 weeks of taking them, I have experienced unusual headaches that lasts for 3 seconds and it feels uncomfortable. The taste and texture is good, comforting, and squishy. I would not recommend them, though. I would rather do more in-depth research on other biotin supplements that show results with little to no side-effects.
customer_reviews.author: A through Z Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item twice. The first time I had no issues. After the second purchase I noticed I was having severe heartburn after taking them. I stopped and the heartburn ceased. It may just be my body's reaction to it but I wanted to share.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: My hair has been growing SO FAST! With the ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been growing SO FAST! With the help of this, I have grown out from a Pixie to shoulder length in 4 months!
customer_reviews.author: Paige L.

customer_reviews.title: YUM
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if these work for hair loss or anything, but man are they tasty! I would buy them as candy, and I eat them like they are candy now.
customer_reviews.author: ButterWillDoIt

customer_reviews.title: Gave me splitting headaches and breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I took these for a week and everyday had a bad headache that wouldn't go away and my face was breaking out. Maybe should have started out taking just one a day but I'm not even going to try that now, not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Katelin

customer_reviews.title: This works for hair & nails
customer_reviews.text: My Dr said ok 2 a day. My nails & hair have grown like crazy! Amazon price about same but easier to order & in mailbox when run out as Amazon always has in stock. I take so many meds I love taking these as gummies- nice change!
customer_reviews.author: gayle p thompson

customer_reviews.title: The only type of Biotin that doesn't make me queasy.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good. Easy to chew. Seems to help my nails from being less brittle if I take it for a few months. This particular type of biotin is the only one I've tried that doesn't upset my stomach too.
customer_reviews.author: U Dont Know Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gummies for both kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gummies for both kids and adults. My 4 yr old loves the taste. Her hair has grown like crazy. I give her two gummies at bedtime (10000mcg) along with her multivitamin. The gummies have that 'real' gummy texture that isn't sticky or gummy, but rather is a clean bite, which I prefer in my supplements & vitamins. I feel like the other stuff sticks to my teeth, doesn't benefit me.
customer_reviews.author: briekitten.

customer_reviews.title: The best for weak nails.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my nails were the worst they have ever been. They were cracked and peeling and dry, and I couldn’t grow them past the end of my fingers. I tried several topical options and nothing worked. I have been taking them for about 6 weeks, and I can hardly believe the difference. My nails are long and strong. I highly recommend biotin supplements. An unexpected bonus is my eyelashes seem to be longer!
customer_reviews.author: Melva B

customer_reviews.title: Works for nails!
customer_reviews.text: My son's nails were breaking and I tried Nutrablast biotin gummies. We used two bottles of them and they seemed to work ok but didn't completely fix the problem. When it came time to get a new bottle I decided to try something different, so I got these Vitafusion gummies. These are working MUCH BETTER! His fingernails are completely back to normal we haven't even finished the bottle yet. By the way, these also taste a lot better than the Nutrablast gummies! I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: LoriC

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Taste just like a gummy bear. No bad after taste. Was sealed properly. Cant comment on how they work, i will update after a month UPDATE: after about a week my head started itching badly. 3 days after I stopped taking them the itching subsided. I was taking one a day. Results and side affects.. effect people differently...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamins for healthy skin, hair, and nails.  Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product works. Makes my hair and nails grow and adds shine to hair...best part tastes like candy. Have already recommended to several friends. Essential for growing out hair and/or for those wanting healthier hair, skin, and nails.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from my bad haircut!
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser cut off a bit too much hair leaving me with the bottom of hair close to my ears. Eating these biotin gummies has helped a lot. It also has helped with my nails growing longer to encourage and motivate me to grow my fingernails longer because I can see progress faster!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Miracle gummy, no lie
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much the real deal. Hair was thinning And hairline is receding because I was postpartum. This is a three week difference. It really does work. The flavor is great too. Not that the flavor matters to me because I’m desperate for hair growth but the flavor is a plus. Easy to chew and soft. I’m just still in awe as to how much my hair has come in.
customer_reviews.author: Sara DeBiase

customer_reviews.title: Happy. I have not noticed changes in my sk8n ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for about a week. Wanted stronger fingernails. These supplements appear to be working already. I had not truly expected that success. Happy. I have not noticed changes in my sk8n and hair yet. Happy with purchas, though.
customer_reviews.author: V S

customer_reviews.title: Gummies for my inner child
customer_reviews.text: I hate taking vitamins(pill form) so I decided to try gummies. They are delicious, in fact they might taste a little too good. This is my second bottle. I have super weak nails. So I took 4 a day to speed up the process. My nails have gotten a little better. BUT I broke out in pimples. I had read about taking to much biotin can make you break out. I didn’t believe it and sadly it’s true. I’m going to take 2 a day from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingislife

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Giving 2 stars because these were tasty and seemed fresh. However, after taking them I became nauseous, which apparently can be a side effect. I did try only taking 1 gummy [dosage = 2] and had the same effect, so I tossed them. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: running girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have used Biotin for years, but in this form its easy use, dissolve quicker than a pill. Results in skin, hair and nails is visible. Will continue to use and do recommend for people who have trouble with pill form. Pleasant taste.
customer_reviews.author: mysticblue50

customer_reviews.title: My hair stopped growing until i started taking these gummies
customer_reviews.text: My hair kept splitting and breaking and stopped growing. After 6 months of taking these gummies, the ends stopped splitting and my hair is really long now! They taste good,. too
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Strzeszewski

customer_reviews.title: Woah, It actually works.
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional hair stylists, and never really knew if biotin actually worked even though I had heard positive results for years. I thought maybe it was all placebo. I decided to try these and it’s been about three weeks. I am happy to report I am seeing results! Of course I mostly wanted it for my hair, but I am seeing the most results with stronger and longer nails. I do believe my hair is growing a bit faster as well! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Khalee

customer_reviews.title: Nails still brittle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in hopes that I could replace the more expensive brands I've tried and because I use this brands multivitamin. I did not enjoy the taste although I've tried worse. The major disappointment is that my nails almost feel more brittle with this product. I did not have a great experience personally and don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alyshia

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried out a lot of multivitamins and some have tasted pretty gross. But not these. I was hesitant to believe that they’d actually have a blueberry taste and that they’d just taste super artificial but they actually taste so good. So glad I found these and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: My nails are showing great improvement
customer_reviews.text: I think my nails are growing faster than they usually were. They also appear to be much stronger than before. If that wasn't evidence enough, my boyfriend has way more scratches on him. I've been accidentally scratching him a lot now that my nails are so long. Crazy
customer_reviews.author: Misty Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and it really did work. Had some hair loss and after a long while this stuff really good work. At first, I didn't even notice any difference. But a month after I stopped taking it my hair started growing thick and long. Also, this stuff is delicious. I had to keep my daughter out of it because she love the taste. It tastes like gummy bears. Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Askins

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes alright...I switched to this after taking Sugarbearhair for over a year with no issues. This broke me out like crazy and gave me weird digestive issues. Very weird. I stopped taking them. I’m not really sure what is in them that caused such a problem.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to chew/dissolve.
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good (oops, I may have eaten 5 of them today...) and have a softer consistency, unlike some other gummies which you have to really chew hard to get them to dissolve. The flavor/taste is very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and work amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have added these into my daily routine about a year ago and I love them!! They are super tasty, like candy, so I don’t dread having to take them. Haven’t had one cold or sickness since starting. My skin has been the clear is ever been and my hair has a very nice sheen to it. I’ll take these for life.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these daily for about 2 years and I recommend them to everyone! I worked as a nurse in dermatology and the dermatologist would recommend taking biotin to many patients because it is beneficial for hair, skin, and nails. I notice the most difference in my hair growth and my hair stylist is always shocked at how fast my hair grows. The gummies taste great too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Nails and Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I'm about half way through the bottle and I've noticed such a difference in my nails. They are much stronger; now I can wear them long and not worry about them breaking. I'm not sure I've noticed any difference with my hair, but I have Thyroid issues that could be the problem for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: doesn't taste that good
customer_reviews.text: They don't taste that good. Better off buying their hair, skin, and nails line which includes other vitamins and tastes much better.
customer_reviews.author: randy lau

customer_reviews.title: A great way to get your Biotin.
customer_reviews.text: I have taken Biotin pills, but these Gummies seem to digest better, and work better. They are made in the USA, and that is important to me. I trust Vita Fusion for my supplement needs. Biotin Gummies are a great addition to my daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I love gummy vitamins... I'm way more likely to take them than regular pills. These taste great (almost too good) and I think I've seen a little improvement in my nails since I've started on them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kate

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and strengthens nails
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my 4th bottle, and wanted to wait on the review until I’ve been using long enough. These taste amazing and I look forward to eating them 😊 My nails always used to break/split but are no longer so brittle. I can actually grow my nails out without them breaking. I’m not too sure about skin but hair is definitely softer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Choi

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Delicious- makes my morning way more exciting feeling like I get to eat candy. The only issue is I haven't see any results in my hair or nails just yet but it's only been a month. I'll order another bottle just on the taste alone but hoping i get some results soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, Great benefits.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these are gummies. I find that I’ll take my vitamins more often if they are in gummy form versus pill form. Great taste. After taking these daily for a month, I have noticed my hair growing back where bleach had damage my hair. Also my nails do appear to be growing faster.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey NYC

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work on my hair/nails..
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t do nothing! my hair is continuously falling.. One star for taste..
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, easy to take, but too sugary
customer_reviews.text: I keep getting these because they are affordable, but I can really do without sugar. I mean it's a vitamin, it doesnt have to taste like candy. I just dont like ingesting unnecessary sugar, as if we don't get more than enough sugar everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Tastes and feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful flavor and texture. Not sure how it's been helping my hair in any way, but my nails have been growing at a considerably faster rate, as well as being healthier. These go back fast in my family so I had to buy another in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't much of a fan of the flavor but they are nice, soft gummies which i enjoy. Only complaint is the fine print. I was lead to believe each gummie was 5000mg, when in fact it is 5000mg PER SERVING, which is two gummies. Not as great of a deal as i thought
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: I love these gummies
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummies. I just wish they made two gummies equal to 10,000 MG of Biotin. They taste so much better than other gummie biotin supplements I have tried. I just take double the dose to get to 10,000. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mold at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: as you get to the bottom the gummies get white as if they had mold
customer_reviews.author: paola

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Took these for several months so my hair would grow longer faster and I couldn’t tell a difference. Then I saw a TikTok saying these can cause break outs and just like that I stopped taking them and my face cleared up!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Peters

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as my hair was thinning and, also, have been using shampoo for thinning hair. I am a senior and am pleasantly surprised that my hair is staying put and the loss has been restored with no noticeable loss now.
customer_reviews.author: gbb

customer_reviews.title: Works great tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really believe this would work, but now I am a believer! Mostly because my leg hair is growing faster than ever, but I know that means my head hair is too. Bonus - my eyebrow hair seems to have grown faster and I was able to reshape them. Taste delicious too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is a NO
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if they really did anything for my hair but they were easy to use. I didn’t like the flavor at All! Only negative about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Garcia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Vita fusion looks old I opened didn’t notice. Not sure if I can return
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I usually get these from grocery store, but didnt want to get out, so I ordered them off here. Product had whitish powder on gummies??? Weird. Seemed old or a bad batch. A little unsure and not as trusting to buy this from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Hjd

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but all biotin gives me a headache. Either way I'm going to keep buying it and taking it. Vita fusion has always been a good product. Glad this is in gummies I need to thicken my hair up
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar.
customer_reviews.text: Too much sugar in them. Need a great supplement and not candy.
customer_reviews.author: MissBMarie

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been taking this supplement for several weeks now due ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this supplement for several weeks now due to hair loss from Hashimoto disease. I can’t say as far as length that I’ve noticed but I’ve seen a difference in the amount of hair falling out at least. The only negative thing i can say is my skin is extra oily causing more breakouts than I’ve had in years. I read other users having similar issues with acne and I can absolutely agree!
customer_reviews.author: Lina Meikle

customer_reviews.title: Helped my long locks
customer_reviews.text: Decided to start taking this due to my hair falling out. I have really long hair down to bottom of my back. But sadly it was starting to thin. I was seeing more and more hair fall out when I brushed my hair so I decided to try these since I hate pills. I really think they have made a difference I’m seeing less hair in the shower drain. They’re easy to take and taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Never buying another!
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I’m a customer for life! I can’t wait until my nails & hair grow more! &My nails r already noticeably longer after 2 days of taking this! The only problem, I bet you can’t just eat 2! Delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Sol Grace

customer_reviews.title: Acne causing
customer_reviews.text: Too much biotin gives me acne. Stopped taking it & my skin immediately cleared up. Just my personal experience. Did some research & some doctors reported the same findings.
customer_reviews.author: Hufflepuff Girl

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are so yummy!! It takes real restraint to not eat more than 2 a day. They almost taste just like candy. I bought them to promote hair and nail growth. I bite my nails so it’s hard to tell if it’s working though.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene O.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE FLAVOR AND CONSISTENCY
customer_reviews.text: Some gummies in the vitamin selections have awful tastes but this brand is great in the flavor as well as the consistency. Would like to see a bottle that prevents the sunlight from getting in because B vitamins get destroyed when exposed to sunlight. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: S. Eikenberry

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good it tastes pretty good and easy to chew I will update in 2 weeks on Oct 2nd 5day early nail Update nails looking healthier and its not even been 2 weeks I cut my nails down neatly the day after I made the review so this is 9days of healthy growth for me 2 week update it hasn't made a huge difference in my hairs length but just a tad more noticeable if I count my natural fast hair growth
customer_reviews.author: Shelby arnold

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Noticeable and Great
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and effective. I didn't notice how vibrant my skin was looking until my wife asked me what I'd been doing differently. It took until my second bottle to really see changes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pick

customer_reviews.title: The Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor!!!! I found an excellent choice to take vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin, dry, frizzy hair...it's pretty bad. This product helped make it a little bit less dry and maybe a little less frizzy...maybe. For me any improvement is good, so I'm happy. Didn't see any dramatic results but I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like them. The texture and after taste were not for me. I had a weird tingling feeling on my tongue whenever I took these vitamins. I've now chosen an alternate brand that I prefer to these.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: They taste good!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can’t tell if these are working yet but the flavor and texture alone warrant full stars. They taste like normal fruit snacks and aren’t the kind that are super gummy or take forever to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Might as well buy two bottles at once, you’ll get use out of it.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this about two weeks ago and already notice a difference in growth. I would say my hair has grown at least one quarter of an inch. It isn’t a lot but considering that my hair was not growing before, I definitely notice a difference and will be buying this again in the future. They taste really good too, like gummy bears.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Helped my nails right away.
customer_reviews.text: Within two weeks I noticed a positive difference in my nails. Thought I wouldn't notice anything for a few months until my nails grew out but didn't have to wait very long to notice soft and peeling nails becoming sturdier and peeling stopped.
customer_reviews.author: MsJava

customer_reviews.title: Yummy vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I continuously buy these. It’s like candy for breakfast but it’s the only form of vitamins I know I’ll remember to take consistently so whatever! Not sure if they’re “working” but my hair does grow quite fast.
customer_reviews.author: ZS

product_meta.title: Vitafusion Extra Strength Biotin Gummies
product_meta.description: The new Vitafusion Extra Strength line includes high potency Biotin fused into delicious gummies. Two Extra Strength Biotin gummies provide 1667% daily value (5000 mcg) of Biotin.
feature_bullets: Supports fat, protein and carbohydrate metabolism[1]
Contains NO high-fructose corn syrup, NO artificial sweeteners, NO gluten, NO dairy and NO synthetic (FD&C) dyes
Recipient of the 2018 ChefsBest Excellence Award. The ChefsBest Excellence Award is awarded to brands that surpass quality standards established by independent professional chefs.
